system.description:
You know every dirty trick in the book and can teach them to your allies on the fly. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d71mc2057x7y6c08]{Commanding Presence} feature, in addition to allowing your allies to attack, they can perform any of the actions allowed by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.d8k1x28y4vn6h3q5]{Cunning Action} feature.
  • Medium armor no longer imposes disadvantage on your Stealth checks.
  • Half your rogue levels count as Marshal levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.5el685zm5ggve3sf]{Combat Directives} feature.
  • When you use Combat Directives, you can have allies perform Mist and Shade maneuvers in addition to Sanguine Knot ones.
